page.title: 06Spare time in Pendock
page.content: We sometimes walk down the road in our spare time.My Dad sits down and watches the T.V.Samantha sometimes plays her tapes on the radio.My Mum sits down and plays with the two cats.Alex plays Star Wars.Jason takes things apart and plays with his teddy bear.Tina plays with her BMX and she plays tennis.Antony helps people who work on Grove Farm.Rachael reads books and she plays on her swing.Adrian plays football and he plays tennis.Heather collects keyrings in her spare time.Adam plays Star Wars in his spare time.My Nan does her knitting in her spare time.My friends live away from me so sometimes I have to ring them up.We can't easily play toegether because we are spread about because our houses are far apart.
